    Mozzi Marketplace on Sharetribe

    We (well, me and my brother Steph) are experimenting with the idea of a Mozzi marketplace where people can sell or swap things made with Mozzi. The first test is with Sharetribe.

    less than 1 minute read

    Tim Barrass

    • Email

    We (well, me and my brother Steph) are experimenting with the idea of a Mozzi marketplace where people can sell or swap things made with Mozzi. The first test is with Sharetribe.

    We hope a marketplace will help ferment the Mozzi culture, but also thereâ€™s a remote thought of generating some kind of income to support the development of Mozzi.

    First up is the Mozzi Noob Kit with everything you need to do the Mozzi Introductory Tutorial.

    Anyone can post a listing on the Mozzi marketplace.

    Categories: kits, marketplace

    Updated: December 31, 2013
